subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: His sensational exploits are almost routine now — the sprints to the end zone, the surprising passes over stunned defensive backs. College football fans know all about Darren McFadden, the Arkansas tailback blessed with as much ability as anyone in the country.
